item.title: [PI] Class.8 Convert [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

How would I convert these Class.8 customs into ItemDef customs?

if(i == 13777) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt181 = 1200; class8.anInt190 = 1; class8.anInt198 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 50; class8.anInt174 = 5959; class8.anInt200 = 5960; class8.anInt165 = 5960; class8.anInt164 = 5961; class8.anInt188 = 5961; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Lunar torso"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A robe top of the lunar clan.".getBytes(); }

if(i == 13778) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt181 = 1740; class8.anInt190 = 444; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -8; class8.anInt165 = 5962; class8.anInt200 = 5962; class8.anInt174 = 5963; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Lunar legs"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of legs from the lunar clan.".getBytes(); }
